nodes.text: A male served the Galactic Empire as a biologist. He worked for the Imperial Biological Weapons Division where he was in charge of Imperial bioweapons Project I71A, codenamed "Blackwing virus." After recreating the virus in Bio-Lab 177 aboard the Imperial Star Destroyer Vector, he continued his scientific studies on biology.

Around 1 BBY, a critical malfunction occurred on the Star Destroyer, causing the Blackwing virus to leak. Although the biologist, along with his colleagues, sealed and quarantined the lab where the virus was, the infection spread out, contaminating all crew on the Vector. The biologist was then forced to transfer his studies and research to Bio-Lab 242. However, the virus eventually killed everyone aboard.
